name: portuguese_student_performance
info: Student performance data collected from Portuguese secondary schools (2008).
Includes study habits, family context, social factors, and academic outcomes.

variables.studytime: Amount of time the student studies during a typical school week.
variables.absences: Number of school days the student was absent.
variables.mother_education: Highest level of education completed by the student’s mother.
variables.father_education: Highest level of education completed by the student’s father.
variables.family_relationship: Student’s reported quality of family relationships.
variables.free_time: Amount of free time the student has after school.
variables.going_out: How often the student goes out with friends.
variables.activities: Whether the student participates in extracurricular activities such as sports or clubs.
variables.romantic: Whether the student is currently in a romantic relationship.
variables.higher: Whether the student plans to pursue higher education after high school.
variables.grade_period_1: Letter grade for the first grading period.
variables.grade_period_2: Letter grade for the second grading period.
variables.final_grade: Letter grade for the final course grade.
